long_description: The Platypus Water Tank(TM) collapsible carrier lets you transport 1.5 gal. (6 liters) of water with ease. Low-profile ziplock seal prevents spills; easy-pour corner spout has a twist cap to prevent leaks. Durable nylon handles allow for simple transportation. When empty, water tank rolls up for compact storage in your pack or vehicle. Add Platypus accessories such as a taste-free drink tube or push-pull cap (both sold separately) to increase the Water Tank's versatility.
short_description: The Platypus Water Tank(TM) collapsible carrier lets you transport 1.5 gal. (6 liters) of water with ease.
